section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the disposition to announce in Number 6540, Ramsey against the State of New York and for reason stated in a per curiam opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the Appellate Division of the Supreme Court New York Second Judicial Department is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
